page.description: Run a program and wait until the program closes before returning.

argument.name: command_line
argument.description: The Windows command that you wish to run.

argument.name: show_window
argument.description:
Logical. Show_Window Optional. Default = .T.
.T. = Display window.
.F. = Hide window.

page.discussion: The SYS_SHELL_WAIT() function runs a command and waits until it is completed before returning control to Alpha Anywhere.
